author: tersec
content:
sure, there are a couple of relevant places:
- `EpochRef` stores the `beacon_proposers` for that epoch, necessarily a bit speculatively, but reorgs trigger recalculation of that anyway: https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/blob/d2f23389ab657608261be9f4dcef1009d67fbc2d/beacon_chain/consensus_object_pools/block_pools_types.nim#L273-L289
- along the way, it uses `maybeUpdateActionTrackerNextEpoch()` each slot: https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/blob/d2f23389ab657608261be9f4dcef1009d67fbc2d/beacon_chain/nimbus_beacon_node.nim#L1415-L1495 which uses a bunch of checks to see if it can do a cheap thing or has to do an expensive thing, and even then only does the expensive thing when it's required
